ModMetaData.name: Lovin' Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
Like my fertility genes mod(linked below), this mod gives you more choices on customizing how likely it is for a xenotype to get pregnant on any given day with a lover. Unlike Fertility Genes, this one alters how much they want to do the horizontal dance instead of directly impacting their fertility. It should be compatible with any other mod that adds genes, but let me know if any issues pops up.
Want to change a xenotype's Fertility? Fertility Genes has you covered: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2974206359 Want to see these genes integrated into Biotech? Try this: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2976573675
